name: Parking Panic: Brain Test
description:
Test your logic through a hundred of levels that keep getting harder in this puzzle game. Move cars, bus and trailers and find the way to get your vehicle out of a totally crowded parking. An excellent game for the waiting times… in the rush hours!

Parking Panic is an amusing game for the whole family! Only recommended for... everyone!

CARACTERISTICS
- 100 Levels
- 300 stars to collect
- Best Score
- Touch the screen to move vehicle

HOW TO PLAY?
Cramped inside your red car, you are completely stuck. Surrounded by vehicle of diverse sizes, you fail to find a way to get out of your parking spot. Thus, you have no other choice: you’ll have to move the cars and buses blocking you to open yourself a way to the exit.
